titles.title: For All That You've Done I Will Thank You

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
For all that you've done I will thank you.
And all that You're going to do.
For all that You've promised
And all that You are,
It's all that has carried me through;
Jesus, I thank You.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
And I thank You, thank You, Lord.
And I thank You, thank You, Lord.
Thank You for loving and setting me free.
Thank You for giving Your life just for me.
Now I thank You, Jesus, I thank You.
Gratefully thank You, and I thank You.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Por todo tu amor, te doy gracias.
Por todo aquello que haras.
Por tantas promesas, por ser mi Señor.
Tu amor me ha traido hasta aqui.
Y hoy te doy gracias.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Te doy gracias, gracias, Señor.
Te doy gracias, gracias, Señor.
Gracias por darme total libertad.
Gracias por todo pecado borrar.
Te doy gracias, Oh Cristo, gracias.
Hoy te doy gracias, te doy gracias.
